The best way to get more home buyers is to pursue public policies that create more good jobs, jobs that feel stable, jobs that pay enough to allow the people in those jobs to save up money for a down payment and eventually feel confident enough in their futures to take out a 30 year mortgage. Supporting labor unions and the rights of workers in general is a good way to do this. Encouraging investment in the technologies that will build the future (sustainable fuels, solar, etc.) is a good way to do this. Giving tax cuts to big companies who then close plants and move jobs abroad is not a very good way to do this. Propping up coal plants is not a good way to do this.
